prompt: Create a vibrant loading page with a gradient background transitioning from purple (0xFF7B1FA2) at the top to blue (0xFF1976D2) at the bottom. Center a circular progress indicator with a white color (0xFFFFFFFF). Below the indicator, place the text 'Processing...' in a bold, 22px font with a light gray color (0xFFB0BEC5), spaced 20 pixels below the indicator. Use a Column widget within a Scaffold, ensuring vertical and horizontal centering. Add a subtle shadow effect around the progress indicator for depth.
